original_text: And the earth brought forth grass, and herb yielding seed after his kind, and the tree yielding fruit, whose seed was in itself, after his kind: and God saw that it was good.
korean_text: 땅이 풀과 각기 종류대로 씨 맺는 채소와 각기 종류대로 씨 가진 열매 맺는 나무를 내니 하나님이 보시기에 좋았더라

sentences.original_text: And the earth brought forth grass
and herb yielding seed after his kind
sentences.korean_translation: 씨를 맺는 풀도 그 종류대로 났으며

sentences.original_text: and God saw that it was good
